title: I'm a Little Teapot
short_plot_summary: A catchy children's song about a clever little teapot with a spout and a handle who loves to pour out tea.
explanation: A cup of tea, representing the main theme of the song
A teapot, symbolizing the main character in the song
A gust of wind, illustrating the action of the teapot's steam
A pointing finger, depicting the line 'Here is my handle'
A baby, representing the intended audience of the song
